questions.question: You groggily come awake to realize you are alive on an island. What's your first move?

choices.answer: Lose your mind. No way this is happening!
Scan the area for other survivors
Begin searching for drinkable water
Start trying to hunt wild animals

questions.question: If you are stuck on a large island, what should you do?

choices.answer: Stay on the beach
Go inland, looking for life
Build a raft and head to sea
Stay in the trees

questions.question: You see some bright red berries on a bush near the beach. What do you do?

choices.answer: Lick your fingers and get ready to eat! Yum!
You're not dumb, you need to boil those berries first
Carefully look if they're poisonous
You don't know enough about wilds plants, ignore them

questions.question: You're very thirsty. You haven't found water yet. What will happen if you drink ocean water?

choices.answer: You'll gag a little, no big deal
Your blood pressure and heart rate will rise
You'll get more thirsty because of dehydration
All of the above

questions.question: As you sit and stare out to sea it comes to you: you can drink your own urine. Should you?

choices.answer: Only in the most extreme situations
Absolutely! Any time! It's sterile, after all
Never drink urine, ever
I'd rather die of thirst

questions.question: You have no idea where you are and no way to contact anyone. What's the best way to get help?

choices.answer: Write "HELP" in the sand with rocks
Build a fire next to your "HELP"
Yell as much as you can
Who cares? Nobody can help you now...

questions.question: You washed ashore with a gash in your elbow, but it doesn't look deadly. What do you do first?

choices.answer: Find water first
Treat the wound as best as you can
Leave it alone
That's deadly, you're dead...

questions.question: You're fishing in the shallows when a shark attacks you. How should you defend yourself?

choices.answer: Punch it in the nose
Claw at its eyes or gills
Swim to shore immediately
Freeze, don't move. it may not see you

questions.question: You manage to catch a huge, spikey fish. What do you do with it?

choices.answer: Get the sushi table prepared!
Cook the fish thoroughly and eat it
Release the fish. Fish with spines are toxic
Keep it as a pet and name it Nemo

questions.question: Stress can lead to panic, and panic to death. What should you focus on mentally?

choices.answer: Keep focussed on the next important task
Worry about the things you have to do
Make a timeline to track the days you've been stranded
Concentrate only on the positive things

questions.question: What is the most important survival tool you can have on a tropical island?

choices.answer: Knife
Rope
Matches
Gauze

questions.question: You might be suffering from shock due to your circumstances. What is the best 'tell' for shock?

choices.answer: Dazed, having trouble focussing
Infrequent urination
Sweating a lot
Tiredness
